idea:
Nishkaera, representing a golden era, is an attempt to bring back those special virtues of our golden age, by blending best-in-class Technology with Financial knowhow, and providing a one-stop platform that can address diverse population, especially the senior citizens and women in line with their special needs.
Our business is dependent on three pillars: Learn, Invest and Grow. 
1. Learn: Through this we are imparting education through our website and also through webinar. This will help them to take right financial decisions in their journey.
2. Invest: After learning about the various products, One can start investing to create wealth. We are providing holistic platform from financial advisory to  purchase of various financial products to create wealth to manage liability.
3. Grow: After Investing in various financial products according to the goals of individual will help them to get the requisite financial stability.
name: NISHKAERA FINANCIAL ADVISORY AND WEALTH MANAGEMENT PRIVATE LIMITED
